Compatible with iOS 9 and 10
Tested on iOS 9.3.3 and 10.2

Requiresfrom AppStore.



Use TouchID for Swedish BankID app. Simply because you donâ€™t want anyone to be able to see your code when you type it using the numpad buttons.

No options to configure. Your code is stored in your Keychain first time you enter your code.

The developer of this tweak takes no responsibility if someone chops of your finger when robbing you.

Source code available on

Big thanks to Elijah Frederickson (mlnlover11) for his open source tweak TouchIDEverywhere. You find it on his repo.
